      • DirectionalSensorNode

        public DirectionalSensorNode(double x,
                             double y,
                             double z,
                             double radius,
                             double radioRadius,
                             double suRadius,
                             java.lang.String[][] sb,
                             int id,
                             double deg,
                             double dec,
                             int n)
        Constructor 4
        Parameters:
        x - Latitude
        y - Longitude
        radius - Radius of the sensor (default value = 0 meters)
        radioRadius - Radius (range) of the radio (in meter)
        suRadius - Radius of the sensor unit (default value = 10 meters)
        sb - A two dimensional table that contains a set of informations about the sensor (temperature, co2, etc.) The first column contains the name of the parameter The second column contains the value of the corresponding parameter

        y - Longitude
        radius - Radius of the sensor (default value = 0 meters)
        radioRadius - Radius (range) of the radio (in meter)
        suRadius - Radius of the sensor unit (default value = 10 meters)

        scriptFileName - The path of the script file
